mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TGD_PHSTRN_FCLTY_OPER_MANAGE (GID, OPER_YEAR, DPRC_AM, DPRC_ACMTL_AM, BK_AMOUNT, OPER_CT, OPER_ERN, FRST_REGIST_DT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_MODF_DT, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES (#{gid}, #{oper_year}, #{dprc_am}, #{dprc_acmtl_am}, #{bk_amount}, #{oper_ct}, #{oper_ern}, current_timestamp, #{frst_register_id}, current_timestamp, #{last_updusr_id})

INSERT INTO TGD_PHSTRN_FCLTY_ASSTN (GID, ASSTN_FCLTY_SN, ASSTN_FCLTY_NM, OPER_STRT_TIME, OPER_END_TIME, RSRV_AT, HO_CNT, FCLTY_DC, GEOM, FRST_REGIST_DT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_MODF_DT, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES (#{gid}, (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(ASSTN_FCLTY_SN), 0)+1 AS ASSTN_FCLTY_SN FROM TGD_PHSTRN_FCLTY_ASSTN WHERE GID = #{gid}), #{asstn_fclty_nm}, #{oper_strt_time}, #{oper_end_time}, #{rsrv_at}, #{ho_cnt}, #{fclty_dc}, ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(#{geom}, 5179), current_timestamp, #{frst_register_id}, current_timestamp, #{last_updusr_id})
